mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch(code, name, type, status, tenant_id, create_user_id, last_update_user_id) VALUES (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{status}, #{tenantId}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId})
mapper.update: UPDATE branch SET code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO merge_user_branch(user_id, tenant_id, branch_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tenantId}, #{branchId})
mapper.select: SELECT branch.* FROM branch INNER JOIN merge_user_branch ON branch.id = merge_user_branch.branch_id AND branch.tenant_id = merge_user_branch.tenant_id WHERE branch.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND merge_user_branch.user_id = #{userId} AND branch.deleted = 0
